summary: "Manchester by the Sea" is a 2016 American drama film written and directed by Kenneth Lonergan. It stars Casey Affleck as a depressed man who becomes his teenage nephew's guardian after his brother dies. The film deals with tough emotions like guilt and grief. Shot in Massachusetts, it was a critical success, winning several awards, including an Oscar for Best Actor (Affleck) and Best Original Screenplay. It made over $79 million worldwide.
title: Manchester by the Sea (film)
